updateElements.subHeader: A friendly reminder from your MasterClass IT team
updateElements.mainHeader: Your computer requires a software update
updateElements.mainContentHeader: Your device may need to restart during this update
updateElements.mainContentText:
A fully up-to-date device is required to ensure that IT can best support and protect your device and data. Before updating, please save your work and close any open applications.

If you do not update your device, you may be unable to access data and services necessary for your day-to-day tasks.

To begin the update, simply click on the button below and follow the provided steps.
